objects.specification: A solid floor surface spanning the entire classroom area, with a neutral light-colored finish, smooth texture, and slight reflective quality to brighten the space.
Smooth vertical wall surface with a neutral light tone finish, matte texture, crisp edges, and subtle baseboard detail to enclose the classroom environment without visual clutter.

A sturdy teacher’s desk with a darker wood tone finish, rectangular top with rounded edges, thick supporting legs, built-in storage drawers beneath, and a polished surface demonstrating classic craftsmanship.
A large rectangular blackboard with a slim frame, smooth matte dark surface for chalk writing, minimal glare, and a subtle border frame.

Tall bookshelf unit with a darker wood finish, multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with dinosaur-themed books and educational materials, closed back panel, vertical slat side panels, and a robust frame.
Large dinosaur skeleton model with realistic bone color, detailed vertebrae, articulated limbs and skull, mounted on a simple base and aesthetically arranged for display.
Rectangular window with clear glass pane, thin frame painted in a soft light color, simple sill detail, and unobstructed view to allow ample natural light into the classroom.
Full-length fabric curtains with a warm earthy pattern, soft flowing folds, slight drape, semi-opaque material and decorative tiebacks for adjustable coverage.
